16 Jared Isaacman
17 01/23/2018
18 Q. Okay.
19 Now, Mr. Isaacman, it's fair to say that at
20 some point around the end of 2016, don't you recall Shift4
21 expressing an interest in acquiring Card Connect's direct
22 sales force?
23 A. It could have been anytime, really, in the whole
24 relationship. I mean, Card Connect has a pretty good direct
25 sales force.
00056

1 Q. I mean, at some point did you express such an
2 interest?
3 A. Sure.
4 Q. Did the discussions continue into 2017?
5 A. I don't recall one way or another.
6 Q. Now, you do know that at some point Card Connect
7 hired a financial advisor to explore strategic alternatives;
8 correct?
9 A. That's correct.
10 Q. Okay.
11 And, in fact, do you recall that around
12 February 2017, the company that Card Connect had retained,
13 FT Partners, contacted Shift4 to solicit interest in buying
14 Card Connect; is that correct?
15 A. I do recall that.
16 Q. Okay.
17 And did you have communications with FT Partners
18 at or around February 2017?
19 A. Specifically February, no, but have I
20 communicated sometime in the past with FT Partners? Yes.
21 Q. Did -- and when FT Partners did contact
22 Shift4 -- did you have discussions with FT Partners about
23 Shift4 being a potential acquirer if you will?
24 A. Sure.
25 Q. Okay.
00057

1 And did Shift4 submit a bid?
2 A. We did.
3 Q. Okay.
4 And was it an all cash bid?
5 MR. ROCHE: Objection to form. You can answer.
6 THE WITNESS: I believe so.
7 BY MR. LAWRENCE:
8 Q. Okay.
9 And do you recall that it was in excess of
10 $500 million?
11 A. No, I do not.
12 Q. Okay.
13 And did Shift4 continue in the bidding process?
14 A. I believe until we were no longer welcome in the
15 process.
16 Q. Okay.
17 And do you know why that was?
18 A. Only speculation. Why, I don't know.
19 Q. Well, do you recall that Card Connect was
20 ultimately acquired by First Data?
21 A. I do.
22 Q. Okay.
23 And did First Data, to your knowledge, have a
24 direct sales force?
25 MR. ROCHE: Objection to form. You can answer.
00058

1 THE WITNESS: I do not know that.
2 BY MR. LAWRENCE:
3 Q. Now, at some point in 2017, did Shift4 make an
4 offer to acquire Card Connect's direct sales force?
5 A. I don't recall that, no.
6 Q. Do you recall having a communication with anyone
7 at Card Connect about Shift4's interest in buying its direct
8 sales force?
9 A. It was an ongoing theme since the beginning of
10 the relationship, so I'm sure there are probably some on-the-
11 record communications in that respect.
12 Q. Okay.
13 Do you recall having discussions at or around
14 June 2017 with Jeff Shanahan expressing or about Shift4's
15 interest in acquiring the Card Connect direct sales force?
16 A. From 2012 until we were, you know, pretty much
17 ceased being a partner, it was a constant theme, that we
18 were interested in their direct sales force. I don't recall
19 that specific conversation, but it certainly wouldn't be the
20 first or the last that shared that sentiment.
21 Q. Do you recall there were text messages between
22 you and Jeff Shanahan at or around June 2017 in which the
23 topic of Shift4 acquiring the Card Connect sales force
24 came up?
25 A. I do not.

99 Daniel Drasin
100 08/29/2018
101 Q. Do you recall any text messages between you and
102 Mr. Isaacman that discussed Michael Perfetuo's departure from
103 Card Connect prior to your knowledge of his resignation?
104 A. No.
105 Q. Do you recall any text messages between you and
106 Mr. Isaacman, after Mr. Perfetuo resigned, discussing
107 Mr. Perfetuo?
108 A. No.
109 Q. Do you recall any conversations between you and
110 Mr. Isaacman concerning Mr. Perfetuo after he resigned his
111 employment from Card Connect?
112 A. Yes.
113 Q. What do you recall of those conversations?
114 A. I remember one conversation, and I was just
115 inquiring to -- with Jared, you know, I guess what had
116 happened, or what was going on. And it was a very short
117 conversation to the effect of, I said, "Hey, I understand
118 Mike's leaving. Any insight you have?"
119 And Jared said he was -- he was shocked, was
120 aware, but didn't have a lot of information.

Declaration in Support of Opposition to Preliminary Injunction

13. ...I recall having conversations with Mr. Shanahan and others at Card Connect about the possibility of acquiring their direct sales force. This was a recurring theme in our discussions.

18. ...I exchanged text messages with Mr. Shanahan in June 2017, where I mentioned our interest in the Card Connect direct sales force. I understood that Card Connect was exploring strategic alternatives at the time.
